Sentencas: The optimum amount of Sr in La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode material was studied by observing the charge transfer resistance, electrical conductivity, and reactivity with the electrolyte.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Three transition metals (Cr, Mn and Co) were substituted to the B site of La0.5Sr0.5BO3 and the electrochemical characteristics were investigated by AC impedance method.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity and interface resistance decreased as the amount of Sr increased and the lowest value was shown when the amount of Sr was 50 mol%.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The reactivity between the electrolyte and La1-xSrxBO3 (B = Cr, Mn, Co) was investigated and it was found that the secondary phase, La2Zr2O7, was not formed when the substitution amount of Sr was 50 mol%.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The activation energy of the electrode was 1.186, 1.761, and 2.043 eV for La0.5Sr0.5BO3 (B = Cr, Mn, and Co, respectively).
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The calculated capacitance value of La0.5Sr0.5MnO3 was 3.23 x 10(3) muF, so the three-phase boundary (TPB) of this electrode was broader than the other electrodes.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Consequently the La0.5Sr0.5MnO3 electrode is appropriate as a cathode material for SOFC due to its broad electrochemical reaction site and its electrochemical characteristics.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of La1-xSrxMnO3 for solid oxide fuel cell
